alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sherman County through 700 PM MDT... At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Ruleton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Goodland around 645 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 8 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
